describe: I was looking for a good laptop that could make me enjoy my hobby of music production. I know the standards from the communities when it comes to music production,, but was not ready to exchange windows for a mac iOS.
So far, everything I wanted in a personal computer - compact and powerful.

Great experience , I ordered a xps13 on the 10th and had it on the 25th , I absolutely love everything about this laptop , price my be the only down side ,however I don't regret spending the money on it.

This is an excellent laptop full of cutting-edge features. I am pleased with the performance of this Laptop. The touch screen model that I have is responsive. Booting and starting the services takes a bit longer than I am used to.
Best screen size and resolution in a laptop. Great for viewing movies. Sound is much better than I expected from a device this size. Speed is much greater than needed.
good to use, screen quality good..easy to carry light weight, overall good package, but yes little costly.
